entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collapse/remove projects under src/installer/tests/Assets/TestProjects #77807
    8.0.0
  • Move startup hook tests targeting `StartupHookProvider` out of hosting tests #77805
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Pipes.Tests.NamedPipeTest_Specific.ClientConnectAsync_Cancel_With_InfiniteTimeout #77802
  • Enable running host tests using helix #77800
    8.0.0
  • Update GeneratedRegex to support partial properties #77797
    8.0.0
  • FileSystemWatcher start performance issues on macOS #77793
  • Libraries Infrastructure and Tools work planned for .NET 8 #77792
    8.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\exceptions\simple\ParallelCrashWorkerThreads\ParallelCrashWorkerThreads.cmd #77791
  • Test failure baseservices\exceptions\simple\ParallelCrashMainThread\ParallelCrashMainThread.cmd #77790
  • instrDescDebugInfo should store compile time handles #77789
    Future
  • JSInterop: Consider JSType.Json for conveniently marshaling data #77784
    Future
  • Expose `WebSocketMessageFlags` in `ClientWebSocket` #77783
  • Mono arm64 builds don't pass -cross flag anymore in CI #77781
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] Add new RID for WASI #77780
    8.0.0
  • FindIndex for ReadOnlyCollection<T> #77778
  • Package System.Net.Http #77776
  • Not optimal code gen for IndexOfAnyExcept #77775
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Write to unaliased local overlaps outstanding read"' during 'Rationalize IR' #77773
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Check if `DebuggerTypeProxy` works for assembly #77768
  • [API Proposal]: Add UnixFileMode.Invalid and FileAttributes.Invalid #77767
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: UnixFileMode on symlinks themselves (macOS) #77766
    Future

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add Cut method #77795
  • [jitstress] ParserTests failing on correct (displayed) values #77154
    8.0.0
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting Rate Limiting internal queue does not check the queued request status while replenishment process #77180
    8.0.0
  • MetadataLoadContext accessing attribute on base type #69066
    Future
  • Is maxstack really necessary? #62913
    Future
  • Missing disposed cancellation token registration after setting result on Rate Limiting #76783
    8.0.0
  • [NETSDKE2E] With .NET 7.0.100 GA installed, the CoreCLR symbols are missing for IL symbols #77207
  • System.Text.Json Polymorphic Type Resolving Issue #77532
    8.0.0
  • API extension proposal for System.String: string.Format function for string template #33136
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: String.SplitAny #76165
  • Variable Debug Info covers 0 instructions (using USING_VARIABLE_LIVE_RANGE) #47202
    Future
  • Vector64/128/256/512<T> and Vector<T> Consistency/Enhancements #76593
    8.0.0
  • [mono][hot reload] MethodBase.GetParameters on added method causes a crash #77512
    7.0.x
  • WASM - Cannot import `dotnet.js` in an Angular app #77782
  • Cipher suite not enabled even though being explicitly set/provided. #77752
  • System.Text.Json: In .NET 7, how can I determine the JsonPropertyInfo created for a specific member, so I can customize the serialization of that member? #77761
  • WebAssembly fails to generate trampoline for delegates decorated with `UnmanagedFunctionPointer` #76930
    7.0.x
  • Add strict validation to System.IO.Compression.GZipStream #47563
    Future
  • [pgo] Assertion failed '((-slop) <= diff) && (diff <= slop)' during 'Compute edge weights (2, false)' #77450
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary code from #77068 #77812
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Managed EventSources do not show up by default in EventPipe sessions (#75248) #77811
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove empty BEGIN/END_ENTRYPOINT_* macros #77810
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix CngKey.KeySize for keys in the Platform Crypto Provider #77809
    area-System.Security
  • Unify RunCrossGen2 environment variable to be set to 1 instead of "true" #77808
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix wrong metadata name in test #77806
  • Refactor ProcessStartInfoTests to use WindowsTestAccount #77804
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Run tests, and benchmarks with the same version of v8 #77803
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix EC curve name case sensitivity on Windows #77801
    area-System.Security
  • Add FrozenDictionary/Set #77799
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Updating CreateScalar to be intrinsic for Vector64/128/256 #77798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not add null checks for boxed statics #77796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [ppc64le] Implementation of mono_arch_get_delegate_virtual_invoke_impl method for ppc64le architecture #77788
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0] Correct minimum memory size value from 200MB to 20MB #77787
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • source-build: set the properties to build for mono runtime. #77786
    community-contribution
  • Update tar test data version #77785
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm] browser profiler (again) #77779
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add intrinsics for clz and ctz instructions #77777
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Use correct container definitions in perf_slow.yml #77774
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Clear OpenSSL error queues before reading/writing SSL data #77772
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [mono] MiniJIT OP_XEQUAL for floats #77770
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Switch to the new ARM64 Helix queues #77764
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Avoid returning true from RuntimeType.IsActualEnum for generic… #77763
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Mono workloads: Fix building non-mono project when `RunAOTCompilation=true` #77762
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/7.0] [mono][ppc64le] Fix wrong implementation of OP_CHECK_THIS #77269
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] HttpStress do not use SYS_PTRACE cap for docker runs #77125
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting de-queue canceled request #77182
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Update branding to 7.0.1 #77549
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Fix missing dispose on rate limiting #76784
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Avoid locking during host trace flush when not necessary #77765
    area-Host, 8.0.0
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System.Runtime.Intrinsics #76687
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Use SR.Format in a few more places #77615
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Avoid reporting empty debug info ranges to the vm #77289
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark and expose additional Vector functions as Intrinsic #77562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [hot_reload] implement param reflection #77563
    area-EnC-mono
  • Add option for truncated stream detection #75671
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Revert "[wasm] browser profiler (#77449)" #77759
    test-failure, arch-wasm, blocking-clean-ci, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Support profiles with only histograms #77721
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove Vector128 checks for amd64 APIs #77534
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add RIDs for Tizen 7.0 #76600
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests with stable 7.0.0 #76939
    test-failure, arch-wasm, blocking, 7.0.x
  • [mono][wasm] Handle delegates decorated with [UnmanagedFunctionPointe… #77709
    area-Interop-mono
  • JIT: increase edge weight slop tolerance some more #77747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [PERF][Release/7.0] Update release/7.0 Perf infrastructure to use Perf repo release/7.0 branch #77699
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • More timeout checks in RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #74531
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enable phi-based jump threading when SSA updates aren't needed #77748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection: allow non-ASCII Passwords on Linux Systems #77223
    area-System.DirectoryServices, needs-author-action
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize (Last)IndexOfAny(Except) for ASCII needles #76740
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Standardize test script naming to CLRTestBa{tc,s}hP{re,ost}Commands #76483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate a nearly empty file #77187
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness for spans of elements #76339
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build (backport of #60675) #77505
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Improving log output when an argument is a single non-object array #77702
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update branding to 6.0.12 #77750
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #77059
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 7.0.x
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [NO-MERGE] Dummy PR to test PR benchmarks #77008
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [MONO] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Optimize XxHash3 #77756
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Adding EVEX encoding logic for RR/AM pathways #77419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix bug with BigInteger.TrailingZeroCount #77727
    area-System.Numerics
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • correct code snippets #77581
    community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix DebuggerTypeProxy for structs and for classes with multiple constructors #77039
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts (backport of #74504) #77508
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well (backport of #66594) #77506
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Define __cpuid{ex} only when there's no builtin one (backport of #73065) #77507
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Number block assignments normally #77690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Control if invalid configuration values are swallowed or thrown #77708
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-Configuration, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Add ability for crossgen2 to synthesize PGO histograms #77683
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add readme for System.Linq #77672
    area-System.Linq, 8.0.0
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • Linker into runtime diff #77569
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-linker
  • [wasm] WasmAppHost docs #77265
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Use generated runtime.json when building shared framework packages (backport of #76068) #77510
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.12
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add `IMemoryView` as exported type #77397
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [hot_reload] implement param reflection #77734
    Servicing-approved, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.x
  • [mono] Initial support for unloadable ALCs #77399
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Make Type.IsEnum and Type.GetEnumUnderlyingType intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fixed cross-build for clang-9 #77245
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Green Threads] Various helper calls do not transition to the OS thread #2051

PullRequests

Created

  • [Green Threads] New prolog details -- Combined #2065

Merged

  • Swap to OS thread for special cases #2060
  • New helper for green thread stack segments #2056

Updated

  • Add prolog stack check for green threads #2064

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • After Multi-Target 'Net6.0-Windows;Net48' Why am I getting this error NETSDK1073: The FrameworkReference 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.App' was not recognized #28859
  • Inconsistent handling of Microsoft.Extensions.* 6.0.0 and 6.0.1 dependencies #28856
  • MacOS Issues #28848

Closed

  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With version17.4.0 preview 3.0 + .net7 rc2 SDK installed on locale OS, some template names are unlocalized after running "dotnet new --list" in CLI . #28068

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the downlevel feeds to reduce overall footprint #28860
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28858
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28857
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [WIP]Introduce a shared project Microsoft.DotNet.ApiSymbolExtension #28855
    Area-GenAPI
  • Import the Container Build package from WebSDK #28845
    Area-WebSDK

Merged

  • Fix typo in GivenThatWeWantToPublishReadyToRun.cs #27914
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Switch back to the shipped RC2 build #28785
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable codeql in servicing #28605
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.404 #28841
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #28844
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Introduce PublishRuntimeIdentifier #28717
    Area-CLI
  • Improve Tests for Implicit RIDs and Libraries #28696
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #27542
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update current TFM #28715
    Area-ILLink
  • Introduce PublishSelfContained #28714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle test parser forwarded args #27961
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28828
    Area-Infrastructure
  • removed `v` prefix from `dotnetcli` host version #28776
    Area-dotnet new

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal Question: Allow lambda conversion despite optional parameter or `params` differences #6651

Closed

  • Task Manager with old layout shown when executing from code #6646

PullRequests

Created

  • Warn for lambda defaults/`params` differences #6648

Merged

  • Fix typos and bulleting indentation #6642

Updated

  • Address null-conditional-assignment proposal feedback #6635

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# Interactive code completion gets broken after a broken code was input #65191
  • Introduce-parameter has to be deprioritized #65186
  • NullReferenceExceptions when using wrong conditional delegate types #65183
  • Feature 'Edit and Continue' currently unavailable due to an internal error. Read out of bounds. #65176
    17.5
  • Servicing branches for releases #65174
  • Issues with error list entries with LSP pull diagnostics enabled #65172
    17.5
  • Missing warning of possible use of null reference in large method #65171
  • Events in records are included in generated Equals #65170
  • Assert in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Binder.GetValEscape method during build #65167
  • Unreachable exception in `EEMethodSymbol.DeclaringSyntaxReferences` #65165

Closed

  • Convert to Interpolated string should consider the context #50400
    Backlog
  • Debugging locally built roslyn bits ends up debugging through old roslyn bits referenced by codestyle layer. #50267
    Backlog
  • "IDE0072: Populate switch" showing up on complete switch expression #48876
    Backlog
  • Showing <remarks> in QuickInfo results in very large tooltips for Xamarin #42606
    Backlog
  • Move Solution Crawler OOP #42181
    Next
  • Diagnostic text for CS4016 is inaccurate for `ValueTask<T>` methods #64863
    Compiler.Next
  • StreamJsonRpc that ships for interactive host needs an upgrade #46719
    Backlog
  • Completion seems broken (no entries in IntelliSense list) in most recent d17.4 #65060
    17.5
  • "Use pattern matching" should attempt to reuse variable name within trailing try block #42462
    Backlog
  • Cannot find references to generated method in hand-written source #65105
    17.5
  • Ctrl+Q search does not return items on first search, early in session #48860
    Backlog
  • Auto complete the parenthesis when trying to wrap type #48852
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio crashes when working with large files. #48592
    Backlog
  • IDE0038 C# Use pattern matching in LINQ Expression #48520
    Backlog
  • Add Glyphs for records #48127
    Backlog
  • Separate import directive groups only works when already sorted correctly #47910
    Backlog
  • Use IThreadingCOntext.DisposalToken in ExternalErrorDiagnosticUpdateSource #47694
    Backlog
  • Remove custom immutable collection message pack serialization #47533
    Backlog
  • Add support for LSP custom token types once supported #46582
    Backlog
  • Improve "Add file banner" #46277
    Backlog
  • Use IOpenDocumentService instead of IVsUIShellOpenDocument + RDT #45954
    Backlog
  • SymbolFinder can't translate framework type symbols if original compilation targets different framework #45404
    Backlog
  • Consider enabling CA1713 (Events should not have 'Before' or 'After' prefix) #44235
  • Consider enabling CA2249 (Consider using 'String.Contains' instead of 'String.IndexOf') #44234
  • Consider enabling CA1835 (Prefer the 'Memory'-based overloads for 'ReadAsync' and 'WriteAsync') #44233
  • Consider enabling CA1834 (Consider using 'StringBuilder.Append(char)' when applicable) #44232
  • Enable FixProvider for convert to interpoated string for Console.WriteLine as well #43656
    Backlog
  • Follow-up verification for unused field ClassificationHelpers.ValueKeyword #43407
    Backlog
  • Optimize ObjectWriter.WriteObjectWorker caching #43401
    Backlog
  • Move analyzers to GetBestTypeByMetadataName #43341
    Backlog
  • Quick action Inline temporary variable can create expensive code #43312
    Backlog
  • XML comments do not show up for the array operator #43164
    Backlog
  • Work scheduler should prefer to complete operations requiring temporary storage #43143
    Backlog
  • Update 'Origin' field in FindAllReferencesHandler once Rich-Nav is completed #42847
    Backlog
  • Semantic classification is slow binding symbols in large files #42753
    Backlog
  • Refactor large state machines in AbstractChangeSignatureService #42689
    Backlog
  • Consider restructuring ChangeSignatureAnalyzedContext and subtypes #42688
    Backlog
  • Retargeting asserts when attribute forwarded in NoPia scenario #65048
    17.5
  • IDE0019 introduces nullable warnings on arrays #40006
    Backlog
  • Semantic snippets: new snippets don't have tooltips #64925
    17.5 P2
  • Roslyn is double-parsing command-line options when we AbstractProject.SetOptions #20665
    Backlog
  • ArrayBuilderExtensions.FreeAll is wrapped with nullable disable #39052
    Compiler.Next
  • InitializeToolset flakiness in correctness builds #58199
    17.4
  • CodeFix provider does not show up #64975
  • Goldbar with KeyNotFoundException in CompilationTracker.FinalizeCompilationAsync #65138
  • DotNetSdkTests.TestDiscoverEditorAndGlobalConfigFilesCanBeDisabled is flaky #64542
    17.5
  • Autogeneration of interface implementation for IDiaStackWalkHelper is confused by indexed getter #39434
    Backlog
  • Remove Obsolete internal overload of TryGetDocumentForFile #20812
    Backlog
  • Can this tool obtain the namespace of each element in the C# file? #65164
  • Revisit ApiUsageIncrementalAnalyzerProvider #41411
    Backlog
  • Use implicit type should ignore top-level nullability #41244
    Backlog
  • AddParameterDialog.OK_Click should take type and name values from IntellisenseTextBox view models rather than from control #41149
    Backlog
  • Consider removing GetAddedParameter from IChangeSignatureOptionsService #41145
    Backlog
  • refactor TryCreateUpdatedSolutionAsync #41136
    Backlog
  • CSharpChangeSignatureService and VisualBasicChangeSignatureService - use code generator instead of syntaxfactory where possible #41130
    Backlog
  • Change VS menu from "Remove/Reorder Parameters" to "Change Signature" (on Editor side) #41049
    Backlog
  • InlineRenameSession should eagerly cancel unnecessary work #40891
    Backlog
  • Pending nullable cleanup work in SuggestedActionSource.cs and CodeRefactoringService.cs #40166
    Backlog
  • Rename 'MultiAdd' extensions to 'Add' #40102
    Backlog
  • Allow Razor to Create/Update/Delete C# content in the Workspace. #40094
    Backlog
  • Need to evaluate how our code change services handle linked documents #40040
    Backlog
  • CodeFix for CS1998 does not consider/adapt all kinds of usages #39890
    Backlog
  • Have CodeLens Referenes Window Use FAR instead #14102
    Backlog
  • Code Style: Support running Code Fixes automatically as part of a cleanup experience #7068
    Backlog
  • Add VS command to make it easy to run code formatting on an entire project or solution #4469
    Backlog
  • Support undo for Complete Statement feature #37577
    Backlog
  • Unused using statements are no longer greyed out #65169
  • Auto-generation of control events is not placing code correctly.... #37339
    Backlog
  • 'messages' seem to populate one project at a time (or worse). #37208
    Backlog
  • Add classification support for the nullable suppression operator #37175
    Backlog
  • Refactor and add helper functions for naming style rules for constructor refactorings #36622
    Backlog
  • Consider if SuppressionDescriptor should be a struct #36568
    Backlog
  • Make RemoteHost to start itself when someone ask for it. #36559
    Backlog
  • make asp.net core razor to use new DynamicFile code path rather than ContainedDocument code path #36135
    Backlog
  • remove workaround once https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/35514 is fixed #35615
    Backlog
  • 📝Convert method in Complete Statement to Iterative #35156
    Backlog
  • remove double execute command handler pattern we have. #34428
    Backlog
  • Enable VSTHRD003 (Avoid awaiting foreign Tasks) #34331
    Backlog
  • Consider combining GenerateParameterName methods in SyntaxTreeExtensions.cs and .vb #33726
    Backlog
  • async completion: check for !IsCommitCharacter is not covered by Roslyn unit tests #33710
    Backlog
  • make solution crawler to run all pending work from previous solution before processing work from new solution #33504
    Backlog
  • RootCodeModel.GetCompilation() accesses Task<TResult>.Result incorrectly #33084
    Backlog
  • Need documentation page itemizing the command handling chains #32295
    Backlog
  • Refactor LooksLikeNodeInArgumentList method of Complete Statement #32260
    Backlog
  • Assertion failure in RemoveUnusedMembers.AbstractRemoveUnusedMembersDiagnosticAnalyzer`2 #48247
    17.5 P2
  • use NoProjection option once it becomes public API #32253
    Backlog
  • Refactor Complete Statement to use a matrix model #32212
    Backlog
  • Refactor SemicolonIsMissing and RequiredDelimiterIsMissing methods in Complete Statement #32163
    Backlog
  • Consider adding complete statement support for additional statement kinds #32095
    Backlog
  • async completion: check that TextTypedSoFarMatchesItem support typing English names in non-English locales #31384
    Backlog
  • Automate enforcement for objective Roslyn style rules on IDE code. #31140
    Backlog
  • Any chance you don't need these anymore if you're returning the file path? #31062
    Backlog
  • How is this different than ReferenceStart and ReferenceLength in this same type? #31061
    Backlog
  • Eliminate JoinableTaskFactoryTaskScheduler #29280

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When using Hot Reload endpoints get duplicated #44857
  • OIDC NonceCookie/CorrelationCookie not accepted by latest Chrome/Edge in some cases #44853
  • SystemTextJsonOutputFormatter calls the serializer with unexpected Type #44852
  • QuickGrid Sorting - JSON Parsing Error #44851
  • Convenience methods for adding well-known limiter types with more fine grained keys #44850
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Extra config not available in IHosting startup classes #44847
  • Compiler warning when StateHasChanged is called from OnAfterRender #44846
  • Default Blazor WASM project should not produce trim warnings #44845
  • Blazor: Inconsistent Build Error RZ9985 #44844
  • Mainlayout Page prevents the responsive table rendering when element has 100% width #44840
  • ERROR java.security.cert.CertificateException: java.security.cert.CertPathValidatorException: Trust anchor for certification path not found #44837
  • Blazor WebAssembly Msal TryAddAdditionalParameter("prompt", "select_account") does nothing #44854
  • Referencing Blazor WASM project from Server project with Blazor Server breaks hot-reload #44833
  • [Epic]: Support returning values from client invocations #44831
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • [Epic]: Support returning values from client invocations #5280
    7.0.0
  • [Epic]: Rate/Resource Limiting #37380
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created
